dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5763 IH: To designate the Department of Veterans Affairs clinic in Billings, Montana, as the “Bear Root Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Daines introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the Department of Veterans Affairs clinic in Billings, Montana, as the Bear Root Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

section.header: Designation of Bear Root Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic

subsection.text: The Department of Veterans Affairs clinic located at 1766 Majestic Lane in Billings, Montana, shall after the date of the enactment of this Act be known and designated as the Bear Root Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States to the clinic referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Bear Root Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.
